message.content:
The problem requires identifying the increase in the amounts of tax accrued but not yet paid from the cash flow statement. 

This corresponds to the line item typically named "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable".

From the provided data:
| Account                          | Amount    | Date       |
|---------------------------------|-----------|------------|
| Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable | 819436.82 | 2024-02-05 |

The value is 819436.82, which represents the increase in tax payable.

Thus, the solution is:

```json
{"solution": {"value": "819436.82"}}
```
